title: 万国码
author: _旋风淼旺_
txt_content:
1.12.2

/blockdata ~ ~-1 ~ {Text1:"[{"clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"blockdata ~ ~-1 ~ {Command:/summon pig ~ ~1 ~ {CustomNameVisible:true,CustomName:\u00a79皮革}}"},"text":"点我"}]",Text2:"[{"text":""}]",Text3:"[{"text":""}]",Text4:"[{"text":""}]"}复制代码
在运行时发生错误：↓
[19:21:52] 数据标签解析失败：Invalid escape of 'u' at: ...ustomNameVisible:true,CustomName:\u<--[HERE]复制代码
1.11，1.10都不出错，偏偏1.12会这样
求解

replies.author: pineapple_
replies.txt_content:
/blockdata ~ ~-1 ~ {Text1:"[{"clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"blockdata ~ ~-1 ~ {Command:\\"/summon pig ~ ~1 ~ {CustomNameVisible:true,CustomName:\\\\\\"\\u00a79皮革\\\\\\"}\\"}"},"text":"点我"}]",Text2:"[{"text":""}]",Text3:"[{"text":""}]",Text4:"[{"text":""}]"}复制代码
1.12后的json格式稍有改动，而且字符串标签必须加""，记得转义

replies.author: _旋风淼旺_
replies.txt_content:
下路ADC 发表于 2018-2-6 19:52
CustomName:"%u
你只打了后面的"
什么意思

replies.txt_content:
